testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.5.3 [Need to Share ESS Device Status] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish ESS Status Information (NTRM 3.3.5.6.2.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N49R687_Publish_ESS_Status_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N49R687_Publish_ESS_Status_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to ESS Status Information (NTRM 3.3.5.6.2.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N49R688_Subscribe_to_ESS_Status_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N49R688_Subscribe_to_ESS_Status_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R399_Restrictions___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R399_Restrictions___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Unique Identifier of the Controlling Center is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R400_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R400_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Communications Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R401_Device_Communications_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R401_Device_Communications_Status_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R402_Operator_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R402_Operator_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Identifier - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R403_Event_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R403_Event_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Event Response Plan - Device Status is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R404_Event_Response_Plan___Device_Status_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R404_Event_Response_Plan___Device_Status_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Status Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.3.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N49R405_Device_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N49R405_Device_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 21 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 22 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 22.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 22.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlESSStatusUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N49R687_Publish_ESS_Status_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 22.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 22.1.2.1 VERIFY that a device-status-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor
Step 22.1.2.2 VERIFY that an ess-station-status-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item
Step 22.1.2.3 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.4 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.5 VERIFY that a device-status data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.6 VERIFY that an eSSStatusMsg message was received.
Step 22.1.2.7 IF TMDD_N49R399_Restrictions___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.1.2.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.8 IF TMDD_N49R400_Unique_Identifier_of_the_Controlling_Center_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.1.2.8.1 VERIFY that a center-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N49R401_Device_Communications_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that a device-comm-status data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N49R402_Operator_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that an operator-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N49R403_Event_Identifier___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that an event-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N49R404_Event_Response_Plan___Device_Status_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a response-plan-id data element exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N49R405_Device_Status_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 22.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a last-comm-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame eSSStatusMsg.ess-status-item.ess-sensor-list.ess-sensor.device-status-header
Step 22.1.2.14 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 22.1.2.15 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 22.1.2.16 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlESSStatusUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N49R687_Publish_ESS_Status_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 23 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 23.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 23.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 23.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 23.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 23.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 23.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 23.7 IF TMDD_N49R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 24 EXIT
